thread.title: Labour is committed to reversing tax credit cuts in full, John McDonnell says
thread.title_full: Labour is committed to reversing tax credit cuts in full, John McDonnell says - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Labour is committed to reversing tax credit cuts in full, John McDonnell says
text: Labour is commited to reversing the Conservativesâ€™ planned cuts to tax credits in full, the shadow chancellor has confirmed. John McDonnell made a statement on Twitter after two shadow cabinet ministers appeared to equivocate over whether the party would reverse the Tory policy if it came to power. " We are calling on Osborne to reverse his decision to cut tax credits. If he doesn't reverse these cuts, we're making it clear that we will, " he tweeted. Read more
